# delegate

**Instance Property**

A delegate specific to the task.

## Declaration

```swift
var delegate: (any URLSessionTaskDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This task-specific delegate receives messages from the task before the session’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession/delegate] receives them. This is similar to the behavior of the `delegate` parameter used by the asychronous methods in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession] like [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession/bytes(for:delegate:)] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession/data(for:delegate:)].

## Using a task-specific delegate

- **URLSessionTaskDelegate**: A protocol that defines methods that URL session instances call on their delegates to handle task-level events.
